page.title: 10Recreation and Leisure
page.content: On the Burley Road between Bransgore and Winkton there is the main playing area. At the playing field there is a park with swings, slides and roundabouts but they have been vandalised. there are two football pitches. Bransgore have a football team and a cricket team which play at the field.The youth team have a club in Bransgore itself.The village hall is adjacent to the playing field.It is a new village hall only recently built. Most of the cost being raised by the local community. People enjoy walking in the New Forest and cycling along the quiet lanes.The Cubs, Scouts and Boys Brigade hold their meetings at the Burnt House Lane village hall.The Brownies meet at Bransgore School.Camping is at Braggers Wood.
